title: How to power a Raspberry Pi 4 - Quora

response.answer_text: Raspberry Pi 4 can be power in two ways, USB-C Port and GPIO. According to the Specs of PI 4, you need to power them using a 5v power supply and minimum 3A rating for both ports. You can use a Wall Adaptor which give 5v and minimum of 3A of current. You can also use a precision power supply by setting them to 5v and again a minimum of 3A.
